snippet.title: for|rest Trailer
snippet.description:
A low-poly walking simulator that puts you into unknown shoes in a desolate, fully-greyscale forest that is devoid of life. While moving through this world you must destroy blinking, disruptive roots that are burdening your path and the space around you. Sometimes these roots spawn new life, and sometimes a human, Charlie, appears. As you play through, the world will gradually saturate and life will begin to populate around you. 

It is your choice if you do or do not want to engage with Charlie's story as she walks through the forest.

https://jesklash.itch.io/for-rest
